column5: Thinking if heading to Dollars Lake or Restoule first week of May. Any suggestions on back country camping in that area? Hoping all ice is out? Looking to find pickeral and pike. Thanks Mike
Hi Mike, welcome to the board.  Better hold off on your camping adventure as the fish you are looking to target are out of season until May 17.
See we don`t need a paper Reg`s guide, nobody uses them anyways!!!  Welcome to the board!!!
Thanks for the heads up, can easily postpone a few weeks. Had'nt even  checked the reg's, just in the planning stage. 6 guys 3 boats, looking for some camp sites now. Mike

Oh man, always check the regs first. The CO's do and they will be more then happy to remind you of them and slap you with a hefty fine so that you remember as well.  Welcome to the board. Some friends of mine and I are heading to Restoule in August. I've heard a lot of good things.
